languages.text: "Потому что таков порядок вещей, мон-кай. Вы бежите. Мы охотимся. Вы умираете в муках. Мы наслаждаемся каждым их мгновением. Когда сиюминутных страданий становится недостаточно и из жертв нужно выжать нечто более изысканное... что ж. Твои сородичи — частые гости в моем родном царстве, пусть и не по своей воле".

traits.locale_text: "Потому что таков порядок вещей, мон-кай. Вы бежите. Мы охотимся. Вы умираете в муках. Мы наслаждаемся каждым их мгновением. Когда сиюминутных страданий становится недостаточно и из жертв нужно выжать нечто более изысканное... что ж. Твои сородичи — частые гости в моем родном царстве, пусть и не по своей воле".
traits.speaker: Marazhai

languages.text: "Because that is the way of things, mon-keigh. You run. We hunt. You die suffering. We relish every moment of it. When immediate torment loses its lustre and we seek ways to extract something more exquisite from our victims, well... Your kin are frequent guests in my home realm, albeit not of their own volition."
languages.original_text: "Потому что таков порядок вещей, мон-кай. Вы бежите. Мы охотимся. Вы умираете в муках. Мы наслаждаемся каждым их мгновением. Когда сиюминутных страданий становится недостаточно и из жертв нужно выжать нечто более изысканное... что ж. Твои сородичи — частые гости в моем родном царстве, пусть и не по своей воле".

traits.locale_text: "Because that is the way of things, mon-keigh. You run. We hunt. You die suffering. We relish every moment of it. When immediate torment loses its lustre and we seek ways to extract something more exquisite from our victims, well... Your kin are frequent guests in my home realm, albeit not of their own volition."
traits.speaker: Marazhai

languages.text: «Porque así es como funcionan las cosas, mon-keigh. Vosotros huis, nosotros cazamos. Vosotros morís sufriendo y nosotros nos deleitamos. Cuando el tormento inmediato pierde el interés y buscamos formas de extraer algo más exquisito de nuestras víctimas, pues... tu gente visita nuestros dominios a menudo, aunque no sea de forma voluntaria».
languages.original_text: "Because that is the way of things, mon-keigh. You run. We hunt. You die suffering. We relish every moment of it. When immediate torment loses its lustre and we seek ways to extract something more exquisite from our victims, well... Your kin are frequent guests in my home realm, albeit not of their own volition."

traits.locale_text: «Porque así es como funcionan las cosas, mon-keigh. Vosotros huis, nosotros cazamos. Vosotros morís sufriendo y nosotros nos deleitamos. Cuando el tormento inmediato pierde el interés y buscamos formas de extraer algo más exquisito de nuestras víctimas, pues... tu gente visita nuestros dominios a menudo, aunque no sea de forma voluntaria».
traits.speaker: Marazhai

languages.text: “因为这就是规矩，猴子。你们逃命，我们狩猎。你们痛苦地死亡，而我们享受你们死亡的每一刻。当眼下的折磨变得无聊时，我们便会想办法从猎物身上提取出更多精美的东西，就是这样……我的族人常常会造访你们的族群，尽管你们并不欢迎我们的造访。”
languages.original_text: "Because that is the way of things, mon-keigh. You run. We hunt. You die suffering. We relish every moment of it. When immediate torment loses its lustre and we seek ways to extract something more exquisite from our victims, well... Your kin are frequent guests in my home realm, albeit not of their own volition."

traits.locale_text: “因为这就是规矩，猴子。你们逃命，我们狩猎。你们痛苦地死亡，而我们享受你们死亡的每一刻。当眼下的折磨变得无聊时，我们便会想办法从猎物身上提取出更多精美的东西，就是这样……我的族人常常会造访你们的族群，尽管你们并不欢迎我们的造访。”
traits.speaker: Marazhai

languages.text: 「モン＝ケイよ、それが自然の摂理だからだ。お前たちは逃げ、我々は狩る。お前たちは苦痛に悶えながら死に、我々はその瞬間を味わいつくす。目先の苦痛が輝きを失い、犠牲者からより素晴らしいものを引き出す方法を求めるときは…自発的ではないにせよ、お前の同胞は我が領域によく招待されている」
languages.original_text: "Because that is the way of things, mon-keigh. You run. We hunt. You die suffering. We relish every moment of it. When immediate torment loses its lustre and we seek ways to extract something more exquisite from our victims, well... Your kin are frequent guests in my home realm, albeit not of their own volition."

traits.locale_text: 「モン＝ケイよ、それが自然の摂理だからだ。お前たちは逃げ、我々は狩る。お前たちは苦痛に悶えながら死に、我々はその瞬間を味わいつくす。目先の苦痛が輝きを失い、犠牲者からより素晴らしいものを引き出す方法を求めるときは…自発的ではないにせよ、お前の同胞は我が領域によく招待されている」
traits.speaker: Marazhai

languages.text: "Weil das der Lauf der Dinge ist, Chem-Pan-Sey. Ihr lauft weg. Wir jagen. Ihr sterbt qualvoll. Wie genießen jeden Augenblick davon. Und wenn die unmittelbare Pein ihren Reiz verliert und wir etwas Außergewöhnlicheres aus unseren Opfern herausholen wollen, dann ... Die Euren sind häufig Gäste bei mir zu Hause, wenn auch nicht ganz freiwillig."
languages.original_text: "Because that is the way of things, mon-keigh. You run. We hunt. You die suffering. We relish every moment of it. When immediate torment loses its lustre and we seek ways to extract something more exquisite from our victims, well... Your kin are frequent guests in my home realm, albeit not of their own volition."

traits.locale_text: "Weil das der Lauf der Dinge ist, Chem-Pan-Sey. Ihr lauft weg. Wir jagen. Ihr sterbt qualvoll. Wie genießen jeden Augenblick davon. Und wenn die unmittelbare Pein ihren Reiz verliert und wir etwas Außergewöhnlicheres aus unseren Opfern herausholen wollen, dann ... Die Euren sind häufig Gäste bei mir zu Hause, wenn auch nicht ganz freiwillig."
traits.speaker: Marazhai

languages.original_text: "Because that is the way of things, mon-keigh. You run. We hunt. You die suffering. We relish every moment of it. When immediate torment loses its lustre and we seek ways to extract something more exquisite from our victims, well... Your kin are frequent guests in my home realm, albeit not of their own volition."

languages.text: « Parce que tel est l'ordre des choses, mon-keigh. Vous fuyez, nous chassons. Vous mourez dans d'atroces souffrances, nous en savourons chaque instant. Quand le tourment immédiat perd de son attrait et que nous désirons tirer quelque chose de plus exquis de nos victimes, eh bien... Disons que vos semblables se rendent fréquemment dans mon domaine d'origine, mais pas de leur plein gré. »
languages.original_text: "Because that is the way of things, mon-keigh. You run. We hunt. You die suffering. We relish every moment of it. When immediate torment loses its lustre and we seek ways to extract something more exquisite from our victims, well... Your kin are frequent guests in my home realm, albeit not of their own volition."

traits.locale_text: « Parce que tel est l'ordre des choses, mon-keigh. Vous fuyez, nous chassons. Vous mourez dans d'atroces souffrances, nous en savourons chaque instant. Quand le tourment immédiat perd de son attrait et que nous désirons tirer quelque chose de plus exquis de nos victimes, eh bien... Disons que vos semblables se rendent fréquemment dans mon domaine d'origine, mais pas de leur plein gré. »
traits.speaker: Marazhai

languages.text: "Saldırıyorum çünkü işler burada böyle işliyor mon-keigh. Siz kaçarsınız, biz kovalarız. Sonra siz acı çekerek can verirsiniz, biz bunu izlemekten haz alırız. Bu eziyet, göz kamaştırıcı ışıltısını kaybettiğindeyse kurbanlarımızdan farklı bir şekilde istifade ederiz... Yani türünü, bile isteye gelmiyor olsalar da diyarımızda pek sık ağırlarız."
languages.original_text: "Because that is the way of things, mon-keigh. You run. We hunt. You die suffering. We relish every moment of it. When immediate torment loses its lustre and we seek ways to extract something more exquisite from our victims, well... Your kin are frequent guests in my home realm, albeit not of their own volition."

traits.locale_text: "Saldırıyorum çünkü işler burada böyle işliyor mon-keigh. Siz kaçarsınız, biz kovalarız. Sonra siz acı çekerek can verirsiniz, biz bunu izlemekten haz alırız. Bu eziyet, göz kamaştırıcı ışıltısını kaybettiğindeyse kurbanlarımızdan farklı bir şekilde istifade ederiz... Yani türünü, bile isteye gelmiyor olsalar da diyarımızda pek sık ağırlarız."
traits.speaker: Marazhai
